nodes.text: Boteke was a male lieutenant who served as one of Aves' subordinates during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the battle on Corellia, Boteke discovered that the Empire was preparing to deploy special forces against the trapped Republic Military. He was able to send this report to General Aves until he was killed in the process of gaining the information. After his death, Aves' CorSec allies were able to gain the information on the emitters' location.
